entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
